document.docAuthor: Hassan, Muhammad Asghar, Oswald, John D., Zia, Ahmed & Liu, Xingyue
document.masterDocTitle: Neuropterida (Insecta: Megaloptera, Raphidioptera, Neuroptera) of Pakistan: a catalogue and faunistic review
